experiences.description: Generating daily vehicle reports detailing swaps, kilometers, and kilowatt-hours. Regularly updating the daily vehicle tracker. Updating the DCO sheet promptly upon receiving requests. Data cleaning (Excel).

Generated Open Purchase Requisition Report on daily basis through SAP. Timely placing of Domestic Purchase orders as per schedule and mail received from purchasers. Closing GRN in SAP with coordinators through telegram groups. Creation of GRN Report of all plants at the end of the day and sharing it with the team daily. Creating Purchase Order based on requirement. Interplant PO and PR as per PR number.
